title: Elephant Car Wash
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 59 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: In Elephant Car Wash, students will read about an elephant that washes a car. An elephant washing a car creates an amusing image for students. They will also enjoy the silly twist at the end of the story. The book uses detailed, colorful illustrations; high-frequency words; and a repetitive sentence pattern to support readers. The book can be also used to teach students how to identify story elements, as well as how to locate and use declarative sentences.
